column.name: username
column.comment: dss login name of user adding task

column.name: type
column.comment: type of task...1 = normal, 2 = long term project

column.name: longt
column.comment: long term task a regular task is assigned too

column.name: prior
column.comment: 0 = low priority, 1 = normal priority, 2 = hight priority

column.name: task
column.comment: just a quick description of the task needing to be done

column.name: dsc
column.comment: description of the task..may not be presenct

column.name: progr
column.comment: progress made on a task b/f it is completed
